software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry

Interface RetryStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRetryStrategyImpl

    public interface RetryStrategy
    Interface for executing operations with retry logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryStrategy amend(RetryPolicy policy)
      Adds a retry policy to the strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.IORunnable runnable)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Executes a runnable with retry logic.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the operation to execute
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the operation fails after all retry attempts

      • get

        <T> T get(software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.IOSupplier<T> supplier)
   throws java.io.IOException
        Executes a supplier with retry logic.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type of the supplier
        Parameters:
        supplier - the operation to execute
        Returns:
        result of the supplier
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the operation fails after all retry attempts

      • amend

        RetryStrategy amend(RetryPolicy policy)
        Adds a retry policy to the strategy. This will be policy first to execute as it is appended to the policy list.
        Parameters:
        policy -
        Returns:
        a new RetryStrategy with the policy appended

      • merge

        RetryStrategy merge(RetryStrategy strategy)
        Merge two retry strategies and return a new RetryStrategy. This new strategy will execute policies from both strategies in order.
        Parameters:
        strategy -
        Returns:
        a new RetryStrategy

      • getRetryPolicies

        java.util.List<RetryPolicy> getRetryPolicies()
        Get retry policies associated with a RetryStrategy
        Returns:
        list of RetryPolicy
